hints.text: To confirm any of the missing words in the limericks, submit the word as an answer.
One of the words in each limerick is the name of a city in Ireland.
Use the mechanism associated with each limerick (e.g., LETTERBANK) to derive the two words. For example, the city in the first limerick is DUBLIN which is a letter bank for BUILDIN'.
